select RIGHT(lft.createtime,2) createtime,LEFT(avg(lft.volume),5) volume from (select location_id,DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H') createtime,volume from monitor_value group by location_id,createtime,volume) lft left join location ln on ln.kid = lft.location_id where lft.createtime >= DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 10 HOUR) and ln.site_id = #{kid} group by createtime order by createtime

select lft.createtime,LEFT(avg(lft.volume),5) volume from (select mv.location_id,mv.volume,DATE_FORMAT(mv.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') createtime from monitor_value mv where mv.create_time >= curdate() and mv.create_time < date_sub(curdate(),interval -1 day) ) lft left join location ln on ln.kid = lft.location_id where ln.site_id = #{kid} group by lft.createtime order by lft.createtime DESC

select RIGHT(lft.createtime,5) createtime,LEFT(avg(lft.volume),5) volume from (select mv.location_id,mv.volume,DATE_FORMAT(mv.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') createtime from monitor_value mv where mv.create_time >= curdate() and mv.create_time < date_sub(curdate(),interval -1 day) ) lft left join location ln on ln.kid = lft.location_id where ln.site_id = #{kid} group by lft.createtime having avg(lft.volume) > 60 order by lft.createtime
